content: Push your bodily limits without endangering yourself by working out on the gravity release bench press. The hydraulic release system ensures you will never get trapped under the bar’s weight while you’re by yourself, as it lets you quickly lower the bench with a foot pedal.

Transform your smartphone into a handheld heat sensor by protecting it using this thermal sensitive iPhone case. Molded from thermoplastic polyurethane, it provides a protective barrier and changes color when heat is placed over the surface of the case.

One look at the astounding beauty of the Virgin Rainbow gem and every other jewel on the planet will seem mundane by comparison. This rare 72 carat geological specimen began forming millions of years ago, when dinosaurs still roamed the Earth.

Two of the world’s superpowers are going head-to-head in an epic brawl using enormous robots like this Giant Monkey fighting robot. China has challenged the U.S. to an all-out match that would pit the Chinese “Giant Ape” against the United States’s “Mark III”.

Ever wish you could take your kitty on a road trip? Now you can! Simply slap this little floating bed up on any window – whether it’s in your car, home, or office – to create an instant hammock that will accommodate even the fattest and laziest of felines.

While this giant Batman batarang may not fit to well on a utility belt, it makes the perfect addition to any geeky collection. Weighing in at around 4.5 pounds, this mammoth batarang is crafted from foam rubber and measures 47 inches across.

Turn heads and stun everyone in the track when you show up behind the wheel of this 1969 Ferrari 330 P2 Le go-kart. This 2:3 scale replica of the iconic Ferrari racing car is/ powered by a 2.5 horsepower engine capable of reaching speeds up to 25 miles per hour.

Listen to your tunes like royalty by plugging in these crown headphones to your laptop, smartphone, or tablet. Each opulent pair features ultra soft earpads, a convenient tangle-proof cord, a deep bass deluxe 40mm driver stereo sound, and an exquisite tiara on top.

titleEN: Real Diamonds And Gold Ice Cream
content: If you’ve ever wondered what gold and diamonds taste like, then feast your eyes on the real diamonds and gold ice cream. This opulent gelato treat is made with the finest ingredients and topped off with a 24-karat gold leaf and a touch of edible diamonds.

World’s Finest: The Collection is a quarterly subscription box for the ultimate DC Comics fan! Filled with over $120 worth of premium, exclusive apparel, accessories and an 1/12th scale vinyl collectible figure, these items can only be found in this box and never in stores!

Give your dining room some incredible visual effects with the Riddled dining table. This custom Italian table features two wide legs designed with a unique laser cut stencil pattern that projects enigmatic shadows onto the floor when the mounted LED lights are turned on.

Restore your sanity by blowing off a little steam every now and then in this rage room. Rather than keep you anger pent up deep inside, this cathartic experience gives you the chance to work through your anger issues on a variety of very smashable glassware.

This arcade sofa chair will turn any living room into the perfect game room. Inspired by the classic bulky arcade machines we all grew up playing, they’re crafted from recycled wood, stainless steel, and a big old comfy velvet cushion.

Reduce the risk of spilling your precious booze the next time you enjoy a drink by serving it in this spinning wine glass. Each 5-inch tall glass features a unique design that lets you spin it 360 degrees without spilling – and aerating your beverage in the process.

Now you can smell like a total basic bitch by giving your arm pits the royal treatment with this pumpkin spice latte deodorant. This organic solid deodorant bar goes on easy and provides all day protection with an incredible pumpkin spice latte scent.

Add a Mid-Century modern touch to your humble abode with this Hans Olsen dining set. Created by the famed Danish furniture designer, this uniquely crafted table comes with four self-storing dining chairs that perfectly fit into the table’s wooden border.

Set yourself apart from the average audiophile by creating your very own personalized vinyl record. The process is simple – just select the songs and cover artwork you desire and Vinylify will then bundle it into an actual playable record you can own!

The revolutionary design concept of the Herrera bladeless drone forgoes standard blade design for four adjustable bladeless propellers that help eliminate four common issues associated with current drones – exposed blades, wind factor, and the noise.

titleEN: Gin Infused With Harley Davidson Parts
content: Enjoy the spirit of classic American motorcycles by sipping this gin infused with Harley Davidson parts. Each bottle of dry gin comes infused with an original engine part from three iconic Harley Davidson models – the Flathead, the Panhead, and the Knucklehead.

With a sleek design straight out of a classic spy movie, the Aquada Amphibious performance vehicle combines style and speed into a versatile ride that can reach 100 miles per hour on land and travel at an impressive 30 miles per hour over water.

Add some color and contrast to your dinner table with this eye-catching oil and vinegar glass globe. This unique serveware centerpiece provides a creative and visually appealing way to store your vinegar and oil in one convenient place.

Say goodbye to flat tires for good by swapping your standard wheels for these never flat bicycle tires. Rather than rely on air, these new tires are made from a solid material equivalent to 100 psi while providing incredible grip and extremely low rolling resistance.

Get the attention of all the ladies lucky enough to walk past your magnificent self by laying out on the action figure beach towel. The novelty design creates the illusion that you are a hunky and heroic action figure catching some rays.

This personalized face luggage makes it impossible for anyone else to mistake their bag for yours. The bags are available in three distinct sizes and come plastered with your lovely mug on both sides so you can quickly spot your bag.

Chicago’s Emporium Arcade Bar brings one of the most popular television series to life with their Stranger Things themed pop-up bar called “The Upside Down”. The bar is designed to fully immerse you in the Universe of 1980s Hawkins, Indiana.

Feel better about your hopeless love life by flipping through the pages of the Tinder Nightmares book. All of the iconic dating app’s worst and most cringe worthy attempts at mating are now at your fingertips, ensuring the destruction of your entire faith in romance.

The first official pictures of the SpaceX spacesuits are up and it they’re light-years ahead the ones currently in use. They’ve been tested to double the pressure of the vacuum of space and look to be put into actual use within the next few years.

titleEN: Half Court Hoops Basketball Arcade Game
content: Go head to head with a friend on this half court hoops basketball arcade game. Perfect for any man cave or arcade room in your home, this classic arcade game pits you and an opponent in an all out battle to see who can score the most tiny basketballs before time runs out.

Get your daily dose of the afro’d artist by wrapping yourself up in Bob Ross’s happy little blanket. This polyester blanket comes adorned with Bob’s portrait along with a stunning landscape lined with dozens of friendly little trees.

Put your deductive reasoning to the ultimate test by seeing if you’ve got what it takes to hunt a killer. Each month, you’ll receive a series of items designed to aid you in your ongoing investigation so that you can follow the clues and solve the case like a real detective.

The horizontal shower’s innovative design transforms a run-of-the-mill shower into an incredibly relaxing spa-quality experience. The top bar is outfitted with six specialized water bars that deliver a gentle rain-like shower onto your back as you lay below in total comfort.

Inspired by none other than the Caped Crusader, the Gotham project superyacht sets itself apart from the other luxury vessels with its all black exterior and futuristic armored design. This behemoth is powered by twin 2000hp MTU engines capable of reaching 26 knots.

Watch time come alive on the ever changing face of the ferrofluid clock. Controlled by an intelligent internal system that is accessible via a web browser, it allows you to customize the clock to display time, text, and even shapes.

Go from the line-up to the boardroom without having to waste time changing clothes by slipping into this wetsuit tuxedo. It’s designed to look like a dapper two piece suit – complete with a stylish pocket square – and comes with a large back zipper for easy removal.

Take a road trip with the original crew of the Enterprise by keeping your car cool with the Star Trek sun shield. The shield blocks out harmful UV rays and features a retro design that makes it look like Captain Kirk, Spock, Scotty, and Bones are sitting inside your car.

If you’ve lost your interest in traditional fidget spinners, you should feast your eyes on the Thinket fidget toy. It features a compact design that fits comfortably in your hand and contains a built-in magnet that provides resistance as you push the metallic tube down.

Usher your humble abode into the 22nd century before anyone else by purchasing the world’s first hologram table. It measures 5 feet all around and utilizes special motion tracking glasses that use frequency separation crystal films so that 4 people can enjoy it simultaneously.

These Bisate Lodge wilderness safari villas offer A-1 accommodations along with incomparable views of the African wilderness. Located in the natural amphitheater of an eroded volcanic cone, the villas offer dramatic views of the lush Rwandan landscape.

There’s pretty much no terrain or natural obstacle that the UHAC amphibious military vehicle can’t overcome. With enough power to haul 3 U.S. Abrams battle tanks at once, this behemoth is outfitted with giant treads that can power up steep slopes and rough seas.

This spherical backyard office is the perfect solution to increasing your productivity while working from home. This cozy office provides a well lit environment with natural lighting and a quiet space equipped with everything necessary to stay productive.

Vamp up your bland decor with an array of bright colors by bringing in this LED cube coffee table into your living room. Embedded with 4,096 full colors LEDs, the cube feeds off interaction with its user – smack it to change the colors or watch it react to the sound of music.

The Flyt Cycle hoverbike is a true testament to what can be done with 3 weeks and a little ingenuity. This 165 pound hoverbike features a series of propellers along with a set of electric batteries that can keep the bike airborne for a period of 10-15 minutes.

Elevate your chef game in the kitchen by slicing and dicing with the Nagasaki Damascus steel knife collection. Each knife in the collection features a razor sharp Japanese VG10 stainless steel Damascus blade composed of 67 layers.

These jellyfish glass tables bring the majesty of the ocean indoors. Created by Italian artist Daniela Forti, each table in this whimsical collection sports a unique design and an incredible color scheme that will memorize and awe.

By hopping on one of these underwater scooter tours you can explore the deep blue without having to learn how to dive. A brightly colored seahorse shaped submarine propels you at depths of 15 feet so that you can get an up close view of the lively coral reef.

Place a stylish spin on the mundane task of checking the time by strapping on this liquid metal watch. This eye-catching timepiece utilizes Metallium to display the time with colorized drops of floating liquid metal – reminiscent of the T-1000 terminator.

Experience the royal treatment next time you’re visiting China by booking a stay at The Castle Hotel. Located in Dalian in the south of the Liaoning Province, this palatial pad features 292 air-conditioned rooms, a full-service spa, 24 hour room service, and 3 gourmet restaurants.

Bring a serene dreamlike ambiance into your home by lighting your bedroom with this floating cloud lamp. This magnetically levitating cumulus cloud is embedded with small LEDs that light up the cloud in a flurry of colors and can even flash to the beat of external music.

The ultimate transformable couch is the versatile furniture piece capable of adapting to any occasion. Available in a range of alluring color options, it can be converted into either a table, a bed, a desk, a chaise, a lounge, or an armchair depending on your needs.

Transform yourself into a legendary crime fighter with these personalized superhero figurines. Simply upload photos of your face, choose your hero name and uniform style – and you’re ready to fight crime – no spider bites or freak chemical accidents necessary.

Disconnect from the modern world without having to literally disconnect from it using the credit card sized cell phone. No apps and no texts – it functions solely as a phone – forcing you to interact with the world around you rather than checking your phone constantly.

Cleaning years of wax buildup will be quicker and easier than ever with this automatic ear cleaning headset. The OtoSet headset delivers automated irrigation paired with a continuous suction motion that will clean out your ears in as little as 35 seconds.

Avoid misplacing your things by attaching them to the everyday carry utility belt. This black bull hide leather belt comes outfitted with four military-spec pull-the-dot locking button snaps that are designed to secure everyday items like your keys, phone, and wallet.

Move around the water with minimal effort by grabbing a hold of this underwater propulsion device. This versatile device sports a slim profile that’s easy to carry and can be held in your hands or attached to a kayak, canoe, or paddle board to facilitate movement.

titleEN: Dell Canvas Large Scale Drawing Tablet
content: Bring your artistic visions to life by creating them on the Dell Canvas large scale drawing tablet. This 27″ QHD anti-glare touch screen comes with 20 points of touch recognition and features a dual-handed design that lets you sketch while simultaneously using the totem.

Keep your cash safe when you head out into the urban jungle by stashing it in the hidden pocket leather belt. The belt features an elegant design that can be dressed down or up and comes with a handy concealed pocket ideal for hiding cash.

Say hello to the MKIII Megabot piloted battle mech – these mammoth mechs weigh around 12 tons, stand at an impressive 16 feet tall, and feature 430 horses of pure American power that’s designed to crush any mechanized opponent.

Give your bathroom a magical storybook feel by lining the walls with these photoluminescent glass tiles. The tiles maintain a stone-like appearance under regular light that transforms into bright shades of green, teal, and blue when the lights go off.

Make your fantasies a reality by taking a one-way trip to pleasure town with one of these personalized face dildos. Wobbling Willy features a well endowed silicone body and a polymer shaped head that can be customized with anyone’s face.

Getting completely trashed at fancy soirees just became socially acceptable thanks to Prosecco Pong. Unlike the plebeian game of beer pong, this version comes with 3 pink ping pong balls and 12 wide Prosecco glasses ideal for filling up with some bubbly.

The iconic DeLorean brand may one day live up to its sci-fi reputation by filling the skies with the DeLorean Aerospace DR-7 flying car. This model from DeLorean Aerospace would feature a four-winged design powered by a centerline twin vectoring propulsion system.

Transform your plain wall into an alluring art exhibit by hanging up the Depict digital artworks frame. This 49″ 4K digital canvas sports a matte finish that eliminates glare and lets you display a multitude of selected works or your very own artistic creations.

Why keep throwing away your money on bottled water when you can simply hydrate using this reusable filtering water bottle? It features a simple French-press styled design – simply press the filter down the water bottle to enjoy clean fresh tasting water.

If you’re tight on space, the flexible extending chair makes an ideal addition to your home. This versatile seat features a clever accordion-like design that allows you to extend the chair apart to seat anywhere from one to four people.

Who needs hard drugs when you can guzzle down a monster can of Death Wish cold brew coffee? Each 11 ounce can combines the word’s strongest coffee with the creamy effects of nitrogen infusion to produce a smooth taste that’ll wake you up with just one sip.

Step into the future by swapping out your obsolete land cruising vehicle for a gravity defying hoverbike! Never again must you worry about flat tires or bumpy terrain – just strap in and glide into the next stage of personal transportation.

Add a unique twist to telling the time by strapping on the 4th Dimension concrete wrist watch. It sports a lightweight stainless steel case, elegant leather band, and features a concrete face on which each hour is progressively raised.

The underwater disco light makes your home bathroom the place to be. This underwater light sits at the bottom of the tub and creates some pretty far out and psychedelic sequences onto the bottom and sides of the tub. Add a glass of bubbly and it’ll become a real party.

Keep your literary or movie collection organized in true Imperial fashion by sandwiching them inside these Star Wars AT-ACT bookends. Standing at 9.5 inches, these bookends masterfully depict the massive AT-ACT’s as seen on Star Wars Rebels and Rogue One.

This self defense personal flamethrower is the radical new concept designed to help fend off unwanted advances. This small yet powerful weapon can shoot a deadly stream of fire up to a foot and a half away so that you can deter any would-be attacker before it’s too late.

The spidey sense is tingling! It’s saying, buy this Spider-Man motorcycle helmet! The Spider-Man helmet is masterfully painted to look exactly like the famous web-slinger’s mask. It’s available in the original red style and a sinister looking black version.

To mark the 36th anniversary of the Space Shuttle that ran missions between 1981 and 2011, user KingsKnight designed this 1:11 replica that stands at a commanding 20 inches and features everything from separating rocket boosters to little LEGO astronauts.

The chairless chair is the futuristic wearable ergonomic device designed to let you take a load off anywhere you’re standing. It straps around the hips and legs, and provides you with a comfy place to sit just by bending your legs and resting your weight on them.

There’s no greater way to throw away your hard earned cash than on the useless box. This completely useless box features a sleek black frame and switch that when flicked prompts a small metallic finger to come out and switch it back off – that’s literally all it does.

Give your Christmas tree an out of this world touch by accenting it using these celestial space ornaments. Each uniquely styled glass ornament displays an entire universe in brilliant color – complete with swirling gasses, stars, and planets.

Whether it’s a western styled outdoor cookout or good old fashioned bonfire, this cowboy cauldron BBQ and fire pit is just what you need. Available in three sizes, this high tensile plate steel cauldron is perfect for both charcoal or wood burning fires.

Enjoy an enthralling 5-star spa quality rinse everyday by installing the Jacuzzi frame 120 shower cabin in your bathroom. It features an integrated audio system, 8 shower jets for incredible hydromassages, a raindrop shower head, and an overhead light with 6 color options.

Kazakh architect Aibek Almassov’s tubular glass tree house project seamlessly combines technology and nature into a four story home with modern amenities, incredible panoramic views of the forest, and a massive tree that grows at the center of the home.

Ensure building projects go off without a hitch by taking the world’s most advanced toolbox along. This high-tech toolbox sports a tough exterior and comes loaded with features like a mini white board and a USB charger so that all bases are covered.

Stay on top of your weight loss and fitness goals by using the 3D body scanner and fitness tracker to monitor your progress. It creates a 3D photo-realistic avatar of yourself so that you can view your body and more easily track your progress from every angle.

Stab Magazine and CanDock have joined forces to provide surfers with an easier way to catch some waves – introducing the first ever floating surf dock! Held in place by underwater cables, this flexible dock provides a great jumping off point for catching waves.

Experience heaven on earth by biting into one of these mouth-watering chocolate cake-filled Kit Kat bars. Available at the Kit Kat Chocolatory Store in Ginza, these Japanese treats combine the iconic Kit Kat with soft chocolate cake for an out-of-this-world experience.

Improve your PC’s audio by adding a touch of natural beauty to your drab work space with these walnut speakers and amp. They’re machined from solid wood and feature a sophisticated curved design that eliminates standing waves that cause distortion.

Take one small step for man, one giant leap for the fashion industry by bundling up with this designer spacesuit jacket. Apart from keeping you warm, the jacket sports high tech features like an in-hood audio system and Bluetooth controls.

Modern typewriters are so mainstream. Set yourself apart from every other writer by strapping yourself with one of these typewriter guns. Canadian artist Éric Nado has masterfully transformed run-of-the-mill typewriters into these non-functional yet eye-catching sculptures.

Alcoholic beverages just became obsolete. Make a drunken ass of yourself in a fraction of the time with the vapor martini. By inhaling your shots, the alcohol goes directly into your bloodstream so that you can feel its glorious effects nearly instantaneously.

Seamlessly transition from driver to captain without leaving your seat while you’re behind the wheel of this 1966 Amphicar 770. This fully restored beauty transitions from a classic hot rod to a cozy 2 passenger boat with the simple pull of a lever.

Give your kitchen a cool timey-wimey feel by placing this Doctor Who TARDIS skin over your fridge. This unique skin masks your plain old refrigerator and transforms it into a quaint and brightly colored police box reminiscent of the Doctor’s iconic time travelling TARDIS.

DORODOROBO is the diarrhea spewing Japanese poop robot that will slide his way into your heart faster than your dicey breakfast burrito makes its way out of your body. When activated, his beady little eyes light up and he leaves a wet brown trail behind him as he rolls.

This credit card sized hand gun takes concealed carry to a whole new level. This small .22 firearm sports an insanely compact design that can quickly fold up into a compact card-sized bulk that you can comfortably carry in your pocket without creating a bulk.

Take care of that pesky spider infestation problem once and for all using the handheld flamethrower. The compact size allows for easy maneuverability so that you to launch a face-melting stream of flames up to twenty feet away.

The Atari speaker hat aims to change how you listen to your music while you’re on-the-go. This high-tech cap comes embedded with a Bluetooth enabled high-fidelity speaker and microphone that you can connect to any phone or tablet to listen to songs or even take calls.

Give your baby something to really suck on with these breast milk lollipops. Produced using only the highest quality breast milk from mommies looking to make some money for a few hours of work, these lollipops will revolutionize the way we feed our offspring.

Avoid unsightly sweat marks by covering up your lady parts with the Ta-Ta towel. Available in various sizes and fashionable color options, this game changing garment helps prevent rashes caused by moisture buildup and fights against boob sweat.

The line between permanent and temporary tattoos has just gotten blurrier. With the two week tattoo you can try out a design that looks and feels just like a real tattoo – minus the commitment – as it only penetrates into the dermis layer of your skin.

Become the greatest musician outside of Hyrule by playing some enchanting melodies on this electronic Ocarina of Time. The “classic” mode plays a prerecorded tune, while the “free-play” mode allows you to create your own melodies.

Whether you’re planning to take your little Padawan through the deserts of Tatooine or just the nearby park,  this Luke Skywalker’s landspeeder ride-on is perfect for the job. It seats two, comes with an interactive dashboard, and can travel up to 5 mph.

Audiophiles rejoice! Fender has finally introduced a line of Bluetooth speakers that are the perfect combination of quality and portability. The larger of the two models features an impressive 12 hour battery life in addition to a 30 foot Bluetooth range.

Why insult someone to their face when you can anonymously send them a big fat edible dick? This service takes the beloved saying to an entirely new level by sending the recipient of your choice a big veiny bastard that they can sink their teeth into.

The Etazin spinning lounge chair adds a new twist to outdoor relaxation. The chair boasts a sleek contemporary design composed of three steel rings  – the smallest of which is outfitted with a comfy recliner – that you can turn in any direction.
